name: Cookie Dungeon Crawler
description: Cookie Dungeon Crawler (CDC) is a Single player, 3D Isometric turn based strategy game using hexagon grids, where the player controls 2 magical cookies battling through room after room of enemy cookie minions controlled by the evil and devious Baker Witch. Use the cookies' unique push and pull abilities with the environmental hazards throughout each room before the oven heats up. Defeat all of the enemies to finally put a stop to the Baker Witch’s tyranny!
